title.rendered: Islamabad vs Multan, Pakistan T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Islamabad: Rahmanullah Gurbaz, Alex Hales, Colin Munro, Shadab Khan (c), Mubasir Khan, Azam Khan (wk), Asif Ali, Faheem Ashraf, Hasan Ali, Rumman Raees, Fazalhaq Farooqi

Multan: Shan Masood, Mohammad Rizwan (c & wk), Usama Mir, Rilee Rossouw, David Miller, Kieron Pollard, Khushdil Shah, Anwar Ali, Abbas Afridi, Sameen Gul, Ihsanullah

Venue: Pindi Club Ground, Rawalpindi

Pitch Report

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 181

2nd innings average score: 190

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: –

Batting 2nd: 100%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Azam Khan (17) and Colin Munro (17) are the leading six-hitters in this competition. They have also registered a fifty each at Rawalpindi in two innings each.

Hasan Ali and Rumman Raees have collectively taken 14 wickets in this edition and have been a part of the Best11 in four of their last five games.

Ihsanullah remains the highest wicket-taker (16), having registered the best figures of five for 12 and going wicketless only once this season.

Despite being dismissed for single digits in his last two innings, David Miller will fancy facing Multan. It is not to be forgotten that he smashed 52 at a strike rate of 208 when he last faced them.

Besides picking 11 wickets, Shadab Khan has the highest score of 91 versus Multan.

When these teams crossed paths earlier in the tournament, Mohammad Rizwan (50 runs and three catches) and Abbas Afridi (four for 22) were the captain and vice-captain of the Best11 respectively.
